titles.title: No More Land Act
To amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund to limit the use of funds available from the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to use for maintenance.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Energy, and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats
